lead_paragraph: The United States softball team returned Tuesday to Stevens Point, Wis., for the first time since the wife of its coach, Mike Candrea, collapsed in the airport nearly four years ago and died a few days later. Candrea’s wife of 28 years, Sue, died just days before they were to leave for the Athens Olympics.
